name: Edited Hansard. 40th Parl.
description: This dataset consists of 1 .zip archive of XML files and 1 .txt file. Unzipping the archive will create a folder containing 1 XML file for each debate during the 40th Parliament. The individual file names correspond to an internal numbering convention on line 21 of the document. The .txt file is a master file containing all of the XML files with the tags removed.

citation.text: Edited Hansard. Canada. Parliament. House of Commons. 40th Parl. Parliament of Canada. Web. 17 Mar. 2015.
